description:
Re-cal-ci-trant: adj. having an obstinately uncooperative attitude toward authority or discipline.
No one can hear you scream in the darkest corners of Kink.com’s armory. And with Claire Adams in the driver’s seat, bill gets a hard lesson in manners that leaves him whipped, bound, fucked, slapped and well used before it’s over.
title: Claire Adams and Wild Bill
